project-basis: mySQL server running on my personal laptop as the database for users and tasks.
project-future-plans: Finish the web version of the app, then start the Android one.
project-purpose: Allows a user to create tasks and mark them complete. Optionally sends friendly reminders to the user when there is a task due soon.
project-inspiration: I wanted to create a simple task manager. I've used many task managers before but they're usually too cumbersome for my tastes. I also want cross-platform functionality, so I can be reminded of my tasks no matter what device I'm on.
project-subtitle: Track your tasks and get reminded!
